RULE.TEXT: IF (load IS low) AND (rpm IS low) THEN volume IS verylow
IF (load IS low) AND (rpm IS mid) THEN volume IS verylow
IF (load IS low) AND (rpm IS high) THEN volume IS verylow
IF (load IS mid) AND (rpm IS low) THEN volume IS verylow
IF (load IS mid) AND (rpm IS mid) THEN volume IS verylow
IF (load IS mid) AND (rpm IS high) THEN volume IS mid
IF (load IS high) AND (rpm IS low) THEN volume IS verylow
IF (load IS high) AND (rpm IS mid) THEN volume IS low
IF (load IS high) AND (rpm IS high) THEN volume IS veryhigh
IF (load IS low) AND (rpm IS verylow) THEN volume IS verylow
IF (load IS mid) AND (rpm IS verylow) THEN volume IS verylow
IF (load IS high) AND (rpm IS verylow) THEN volume IS verylow
